'''Lucky Dog''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:1-Star Artifacts|1-star]], [[:Category:2-Star Artifacts|2-star]], and [[:Category:3-Star Artifacts|3-star]] rarities which can be obtained from [[Domain of Guyun]], [[Zhang Shun]], [[Chests]], [[Investigation]], and [[Normal Bosses]].
